attributes.action: Hold a vote of no confidence for the current government.
attributes.additional_details: I, and the majority of people I know, have no faith in the current government. I imagine other people feel similarly and want to change the system.
attributes.background: I want a vote of no confidence to (hopefully) remove the Tory party and trigger a general election.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for Ministers to be sacked or for a vote of no confidence.

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or the House of Commons, you could start a petition about that.

You may wish to sign this petition calling for a General Election instead: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/314151
